summary: Completed testing of Acad√©mie Jacques Levinet Member Area. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate) with member authentication working correctly. However, critical frontend authentication issue prevents access to member area through the UI. Member login credentials work via API but fail in frontend login form.

minor_issues.issue: Some user records missing 'password_hash' field causing KeyError in login
minor_issues.details: Backend logs show KeyError: 'password_hash' for some login attempts, though member account works correctly

critical_bugs.issue: Member login form not working - stays on login page after successful API authentication
critical_bugs.details: Backend API returns 200 OK and token is stored in localStorage, but frontend doesn't redirect to member area. User remains on login page despite successful authentication.

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access any member pages due to authentication failure
integration_issues.details: All member routes redirect to login page even after successful API authentication

passed_tests: Frontend stores authentication token in localStorage
Member area routes are properly configured in App.js
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend member authentication flow. The backend APIs work perfectly, but the frontend login form is not properly handling the authentication response. Despite successful API login (200 OK, token stored), the user is not redirected to member area and remains on login page. Check AuthContext, login form submission handler, and routing logic for member area access.
